law.text: The board may require a criminal background investigation of an applicant for licensure or certification, including by means of a fingerprint check by the Department of Kentucky State Police or the Federal Bureau of Investigation, or both.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 295, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 19, effective July 15, 2002.
